resources.string: Hai, welcome to this little application. This application has been created as part of my university dissertation.
One-Post distributes social updates to popular social networking sites, saving you the hasel of logging into each one and sharing the same thing on each one.
One Post Logo, speech buble with 1 in it.
One-Post takes the content you put in here and filters it to decided what it is. Then One-Post uploads it to all your social networks for you.
Hello world, this is my update.
